reference.shortdesc: Italic text is used to emphasize the key points in printed text, or when quoting a speaker, to show which words the speaker stressed.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The i element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , class, keyref, and outputclass.
